attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Attempting to influence government policy be means of petitions should be banned. Petitoners typically have no influence of the wording and presentation of petitions and sign up to a loosely worded statement of intent which can be used as a headline which conceals other agendas, such as preventing the implementation of EU regulations relating to daylight running lights. Oh bugger.
